replies.body:
Putain
I'm fine thank you :)
Yeah I was, in southern france and it was really cool. Got to go to the beach a lot, I had a really good time
Sure 
Okay first of all you've always been a really nice guy to me and you're a good friend of mine, everytime we hang out together you're always great fun. But I do understand why some people disliked you in the end of oc.tc, you were kind of toxic and could get annoying whenever there was a lot of people in ts. But since it closed down you became much friendlier to everyone (at least that's how I felt) and now I miss you.:( minecraftwise I never considered you a really good player but you knew how to play (sorry my kurva). 
I'm already married to zizi but he doesn't mind polygamy
It was 11 days ago
My all time favorite is the Alessio26gas !4K Yokabi Edit. It's great for evertyhing imo. Second is PotPvP ! by Sinleth and lastly the Hydros Dualzz pack edited by iSparkton.
Orpheus TloA definitely was. We had such a stacked roster. Unfortunately we lost to Team grief in the semifinals and I couldn't play because of my internet :/ I was pretty disappointed
only if you send me some goulash

Salam le sang!
J'en ai gros sur la patate de ces putains d'anglais donc je vais te poser des questions en français ma biche :)
J'espere que tu vas bien khoya ?
Ton plat préféré ?
Comment ton année scolaire s'est passé ?
Comment t'arrives a supporter la voix de Rememes ?

Est ce que je te manque ? et est ce que orpheus te manque ?
Sinon j'espere que tu passes une excellente Journée, si tu veux parler demande mon discord privé sur Discord :)

replies.body: you're a really underrated player that could get even better if you played potpvp more. Otherwise you're a really cool guy that's always here to mess around and have fun with :)

replies.body:
Okay so back in the ocn days I used to completely hate you and I was convinced (like many) that you were hacking, and I still think you were at the time. But since I talked to you in ts you have always been a nice guy and you're good fun. It's really frustrating to fight you because of your delayed hits but your internet makes you really good. 
We all have different types of lag, you have the constant 400ms (I think), besta has the occasional 1000ms-200ms-3000ms-disconnection and I get the irregular and unpredictible disconnection and internet loss for a good 5 mins (when I'm not going into bestaquiio mode)
replies.body_tagged:

We all have different types of lag, you have the constant 400ms (I think), besta has the occasional 1000ms-200ms-3000ms-disconnection and I get the irregular and unpredictible disconnection and internet loss for a good 5 mins (when I'm not going into bestaquiio mode)

replies.body:
Coucou poto
My very first ocn team was a new french team led by pyzax called Rainbow Outplay, we were terrible but it was fun since we were all friends. I never even played a tourney with them because I couldn't make it to the tourney but it was a good experience.
Okay so I feel like we can get pretty cocky and although I didn't play last tourney I think that's one of the main reasons we lost to team rocket. I think we're a group of skilled individuals that don't play together enough (including myself obv) and in scrims it translates into poor coordination in team pushes, we manage to win because of our mechanical skills but we still have room for improvement. Apart from that I love the atmosphere and I like pretty much everyone on the team. 
You're a talented guy with good game sense but not amazing at one thing. After watching the vid you sent me I wanted to tell you to tweak your sens a little bit but you apparently already did that . You've done a really good job taking over the leadership in apollo and leading in scrims, but I feel like you could be a little more authoritative and tell designed individuals what to do whenever someone calls for help on a certain side :)
replies.body_tagged:

Okay so I feel like we can get pretty cocky and although I didn't play last tourney I think that's one of the main reasons we lost to team rocket. I think we're a group of skilled individuals that don't play together enough (including myself obv) and in scrims it translates into poor coordination in team pushes, we manage to win because of our mechanical skills but we still have room for improvement. Apart from that I love the atmosphere and I like pretty much everyone on the team. 
You're a talented guy with good game sense but not amazing at one thing. After watching the vid you sent me I wanted to tell you to tweak your sens a little bit but you apparently already did that . You've done a really good job taking over the leadership in apollo and leading in scrims, but I feel like you could be a little more authoritative and tell designed individuals what to do whenever someone calls for help on a certain side :)

hm jdirais des gnocchis faites maisons. Jpourrais en manger à l'infini
